channel.title: isaiah on Joshua P. Steele
channel.description: Recent content in isaiah on Joshua P. Steele

item.title: Why Haven’t You Torn The Sky Open Yet?
item.description: Sermon preached on Saturday, November 28, 2020 (First Sunday of Advent) via Zoom at Church of the Savior in Wheaton, IL. --- If there are two things I hate, they are waiting and staying awake. I hate waiting. Ask anyone who knows me. I am absolutely horrible when it comes to delayed gratification. I’ve been known to open new boxes of cereal on the way home from the store. And I hate staying awake.
